mapper.select: select m.id,m.name,IFNULL(m.linkUrl,'') linkUrl,m.path,m.priority,m.description,m.icon,m.parentMenuId from t_user u,t_user_role ur,t_role_menu rm,t_menu m,t_role r where u.id=ur.user_id and ur.role_id=r.id and rm.role_id=r.id and m.id=rm.menu_id and u.id=#{id} and IFNULL(m.parentMenuId,-1) =-1
